values:
answer each of these questions with one or two song titles
I decided to limit myself and only use BRIGHT EYES song titles..


The Ten Questions

1. Are you male or female?: "When the curious girl realizes she is under glass"

2. Describe yourself: "Drunk Kid Catholic" (Except I'm not Catholic...or drunk..)

3. How do some people feel about you?: "Devil in the details"

4. How do you feel about yourself?: "black comedy"

5. Describe your girlfriend/boyfriend/interest: "lover I don't have to love"

6. Where would you rather be?: "Down a rabbit hole"/"At the bottem of everything"/"the center of the world"

7. Describe what you want to be: "I'll be your friend"

8. Describe how you live: "Take it easy"/"Out on the weekend"/"Racing towards the new"

9. Describe how you love: "No lies, just love"/"Love nothing"

10. Share a few words of wisdom: "A line allows progress, a circle does not"

Reading through everyones livejournal entry it seems as though everyone is really content with their life, or really discontent. I, on the otherhand and am somewhere in the middle. My life isn't something to complain about but there's always little things that bring me down...


And now my heads a mess
and I'm bad at keeping promises.

hi. i'm updating because a certain Sean (H) is making me. He is good.  uuuuuuummmmmmm he is extremely hot and buff.  I like him because he's nice to me. sometimes he gives me butterflys and make my face turn a bright shade of pink. I think this is normal. He also has this red bmw he likes to drive me in and occasionally lets me take the wheel because I'm just such a great driver. His voice is pretty kind of like his eyes. He also lives very close to me and that is a good thing. Meerly 2 miles. Sean is not my boyfriend butuuuuuuummmmmm know that if you're a jealous boy because he's probably better than you...don't fuck with him or he'll beat you up and stuff cause he's a skin or something like that. Did I mention he's Irish? yeah well incase I didn't....he's Irish. yup. He's also a funny guy. he makes me giggle and stuff. yeah...Sean is good.

Sincerely,
Mona.

This weekend was spent with some of the people I love more than anything in the world. Especially these, in no particular order. +Charlotte +Geoff +your mom +NICKS MOM** +Nick +Sali AND THIS. Disclaimer: Yes, we do realize we look ridiculous and quite unattractive in alot of these pictures, well, atleast I do..but I don't give a fuck. This was one of the best days ever.

so um, last night was the take action tour. Geoff, Charlotte and I went. I torn up the pit, and Charlotte and I got punched in the face. It was good. We got to hang out with Hawthorne Heights after their show last night, they are now my bffs. oh, and we also chatted it up with hopesfall, and anberlin. yeah. me and JT(of hh) except bad picture me and Micah - he could not have been any nicer to me. I'm in love. call my voicemail and hear him talk. "Hawthorne Heights and Anberlin- MORE THAN 'JUST FRIENDS'" oh, and um it's my birthday.

I need to say that bright eyes last night was absolutely incredible. Far more incredible than their last show. And probably one of the best shows I've been to in a while.

I'd like to take this oppertunity to say... FUCK SCHOOL. fuck it hard -core in the butt. I know alot of you are excited and ready for school, but I havn't even touched nor thought about any of the summer reading, or all that other "homework" bullshit Pali gave us. This summer has been the sex and it blows hard to say it's pretty much over. Another thing, why don't you people comment! There are like a selected bunch of lovely people who do comment, thank you, but for those of you who don't...if you're going to bother to read my life in journal form...the least you can do is comment...about anything. Except for the occasional asshole who likes to post shit anonymously thinking I actually care about what they have to say....'cause they're really cool like that. But it would make me go like this ---> :) or this ----> <3 if you say something nice to me. I know I'm being a tad hippocritical, cause I don't necessarily comment on your journal, but if you take the time to...I will glady return the favor. i will love you forever if you do. You will be my friend. the end. oh yeah...and proof that i own: sliceo1durrbread: hah ah you are my god,

I can be a hippocrit. 
but so can you. 
Even more ways than one. 
with my friends, my actions. I'll admit that. 
Even if no one has brought it to my attention.
I'll be hostile enough to share this. 
I'm a shit-talker. 
but isn't everyone?
If there's something that I don't like about you,
I will talk about it behind your back.
Just like you'd do the same to me.
and if word gets out,
 we'll bitch and complain...
but I'll be your friend anyway.
And I'll do some fucked up things,
Cause I hate your face
But I'll still have my reasons.
It's the age. I'd say. None of us are the 'she's such a sweet girl' or 'he's such a great guy'
we may be cut out to be.
girls are mean.. boys are meaner. 
And I will make wrong decisions.
But I'm only having fun.
not too much fun. But just enough to get by.

I'm not a bad friend,
A bad girlfriend I could have been
but the enphysis in the word 'girlfriend' is 'friend'
so give me the chance to be your 'friend'and I may not be 
so bad in the end. Because after all...."boyfriend and girlfriend" is only a title..so as for titles..I can be anything you want.

i decided that today was a good day to update because it was very eventful. started off with diana and charlotte came to my house early this morning to get picked up by alex and debbie (alexs mom) we drove to the GLENDALE galleria to stand in a line for 4 fucking hours to meet degrassi cast members...JT(ryan cooley) and MARCO (adamo..) i got autographed poster...t-shirt, and pictures. another plesant surprise was that brian came to see me at the galleria. I havn't seen him in a long time and it was uhm nice. then we left and me and diana and charlotte went to century city..and uhm...hung out with everyone in the world. literally. all of century city was there. and i made friends with the remainder of people that are usually at century city that i have not acknowledged. uuuuuuuhhhhhh........so yeah, hang out with me. the end.

anyone have any classes with me??

And we suck faces
to mask akward silences
as broken sentences
weave through a chain of kisses
 
And I wonder if these feelings would fade
like the bruises you've made
from the areas you've kissed
on my neck and just below my shoulder blade..

i've finally come around to updating, but only because people who love me very much have told me to do so, many times. uh i can't quite remember what i've been doing since my last update, but monika myers [and amber] was in town from san francisco a while ago and i hung out with her. we had ALOT of fun. we all went to rocky horror the first night they were in town because they've never been before. i think it gets better and better everytime i see it. it was so much fun. 
other than that i've been hanging out a whole bunch, and going to century city like everyday... and me and diana played with her digital camera a bunch..maybe i'll post the pictures later, if im feeling <s>sinister</s> camera-whore-ish.

anyway, i'll be leaving for new york on uh i think thursday for a wedding and stuff and wont be back till like monday but feel free to call or text my cell. (963.8090) and um, i know i need to hang out with alot of you so call me soon you guys so we can like....chill.

later skaters-

today was really fun. it started with summer school which is always a blast because im taking sex ed. ms. ackerman is the best. we started out class with her showing us this thing and it had an ad for flavored douchebags....that was cool. and then she had us do mad-libs but use really sexual things like "moist cunt" and "ejaculating". then she put up posters all around the room that say things like one says penis, and another vagina, anal sex, oral sex, masterbation, breasts, etc. and we had to go around the room and write down all the terms we know for the words. and someone wrote my name on all of them and then we wrote mrs. ackerman down for "breasts" and like "anal sex" and she was like cracking up when we read them aloud. people were writing things like "charles mom" for oral sex and like, under masterbation i wrote "is my boyfriend" and then she was showing us pictures of the penis and of course i scream "ah, my virgin eyes" loudly.

then after summer school i went to laurens malibu beach house which is right on the shore and it was great. mishana, diana, charlotte, danielle, amanda, rusty, larson, astor, neema and alex goodman were all there. oh and of course laurens darling brothers and sister.  we had such a good time, i had 4 red-bulls and then we were all just playing in the water and chilling on their like private beach area and like in the beach house playing around and stuff. it was really great. and redbull.

wow i dont feel going in detail about my last few days but i will tell you it involved amanda and we went to adam c's house and had a slumber party in his gym and then left   yesterday i saw white chicks with molly and it was really funny and today i saw napolean dynomite with milo (and amanda) and it was THE BEST MOVIE IN THE WORLD. it was really funny and good and you should go see it. bye.

so saturday - i went with sali to skylrs party. it was really bad at first, but i was an "honorary negro" so it was all good. because it was in inglewood and there were only black people. except for michael and ricky. oh and leo(?) and breanna via (??) and then it was "color people time" so it started getting fun cause the dj came and then i got shanked in the butt like 100 times by all the black guys. and all of a sudeen they would sandwhich me 5 at a time while dancing and they said that i was a "freak-a-leak" and that i was "their girl" i always have fun to some extent with all the black guys at skylrs party. it brings out the ghetto in us all. then i went to michael and rickys house and then my mom picked up me and sali and we went home.

on sunday my parents had a party for my brother (and i?s) graduation. some of my friends were here and my brothers friends and we were all just playing around and it was really silly and then amanda slept over and it was fun(ny) and then charlotte later joined us and then today we took a walk in my neighborhood and we messed around bucks house and then left cause  he had to go golfing with his brother and then we played around my neighbors house and then we took a bus into town (palisades) and we ate and then came back home. and then everyone left and now i am here. and oh i got my summer school schedule for pali:


1.HEALTH - ACKERMAN
2. LIFE SKILLS - CASTRO


tell me if you have any of the same classes as me?

can i talk about my awesome 2 days?

yesterday - nicoles pool party in the morning...not much happenin there, left to victorias pool party...that was cool hung out with like everyone and all the girls, and all the boys, but for some reason the boys and the girls wont hang out together cause everyone is gay. but it was alot of fun and then after i went to pali graduation for my brother and hung out with charlotte and jenny and ashara and megan and nasser some, and saw alot of people and stuff.

today - THE SEX.
started with going to natalies pool party. geoff was there, + everyone else. oh oh and i saw sean from mayas party and he's so cute we totally sexed it not really but i love him, he's great. and alot of other people were there uuuh there was a game of spin the bottle. it was funny. it died. oh and some of jumped in the pool with our clothes on and some of us didnt have our clothes on and then me geoff and maya took a shower together. and alot of my favorite people were there...like everyone. and it was alot of <s>fun</s>sex.

AFTER PARTY - so me and geoff decide to get to century city somehow...we walked like 5 miles to a bus, then took two busses to century and finally made it and met up with cameron. century city was the worst ever, no one was there and it was stupid so we left and start walking to dianas and then cameron gets picked up and then me and geoff go to dianas lobby and just sit and lay  there for a reaaaaaallly long time being reeeeeallly emo and it was sex, and then we decided to get even more emosexual so we go out by dianas pool and sit under a staircase for like past midnight and it was really <s>nice.</s>emo and then we went back in the lobby to just dangle around somemore and then it was like almost 1 am and geoffs mom comes to pick him up and i go upstairs to dianas and then left. and the end.

i'm fucking done! graduation was...stupid. uh yeah but im glad to know im done and now there will be much celebrating for.

tommorow - nicoles party, victorias party then pali graduation
friday - natalies
saturday - skylers
sunday - bens....but i dont know if im going cause my parents are having a bunch of people over for my brother and i's graduation and fathers day...and my brother is having a bunch of friends over. and my parents say i can invite whomever i want....so if you want to come over on sunday tell me.

monday - first official day of summer vacation...who wants to celebrate?

tonight i have nothing to do because my familys going to a bancquette and i don't want to go so i either need to go somewhere....or i'll just stay home alone. hey, home alone...anyone want to come over and take advantage of?
it's ridiculus how much they look the same. and no, the top picture is not lucas's baby picture.....or is it....!?

my computer is finally fixed. so i can finally update. here are the highlights of my week.

tuesday - went to yo la tengo with henry. it was fucking amazing, as expected. me and henry met them and got signed posters and t-shirts and yeah. its really cool how there is only 3 of them yet they can alternate playing all the instruments. i expected them to play the mellow rock that was expected, but i thought it was totally cool how they like raped our ears with their SCREECHING solo's. it was pretty.

friday - grad night at disneyland. i sat with heather and rusty and his friend on the bus. at disneyland i hung out with diana, alex, charlotte, nasser, and danelle, oh and emily too for sometime. it was alot of fun. we went on alot of rides and i played like 6 rounds of ddr with black girls. and um me alex and charlotte watched the fireworks. it was cool. 

saturday - dianas house and then alex came and then charlotte and jenny and we all went to the fairburn fair but then me and alex walked back to dianas house and played there until everyone came back. and then when everyone was home (+ johnny) we all took a bus to the prominade. and they went to the beach and i seperated to meet up with luke

luke and i had a really good time, for those of you who were wondering. we saw raising hellen and walked down to the beach and sat in the sand and then went back to the prominade and met up with people and hung out and ummm stuff.

now its sunday uhm...i really <b>can't wait for school to get out.

HENRY IS TAKING ME TO SEE YO LA TENGO TOMMOROW!!!!!!!!! 
can life get any better for me?...
...don't answer that.

since i can't sleep. i've decided to tell you about my weekend. so far. 
friday - i went to amandas house and then jazmyn picked us up and we all went to jays party. it was cool i had my fun(x2) hahaha met cool people, hung out, saw people i havnt talk to in while, had a chance to bond with someone and um yeah. it was nice

saturday - went to asharas house and we got our nails done and then went to emilys early to hang out with nicky and megan.  the party was funn slippery velvet was good, half of half nelson was good, um met some more really cool people, everyone was getting wasted and fucked up and it was great. 

sunday - went to the prominade with ashara and with our luck, we (well actually mostly SHE) got busted by the cops for..doing something. i got lucky, but she got lucky too because they didn't arrest her or give her a citation or anything and let her go, but theyre probably gonna find out more and i'm scared of the out-comes. so anyway, ashara really did not want to stay at the promenade but i did....so she left and took the bus down to emilys and thats when i saw LUKE. and we said hi and talked for a really long time and took a walk and it was really nice and he asked me out tonight. yay im SO happy. he is such a great guy, he's got all the qualities. and i hope it remains that way. 

tommorow - i think im going to ashara wants me to come to her block party thing to harass mikey, and then going to westside pavillion with ashara and/or diana to get a graduation dress. OR i might just hang out with luke. 

the one and <s>l</s>ONLY
mona

can you say.....boyfriend and girlfriend?


more on my weekend later.

so he called me again today. <3 oh but then....hecalled! not him, but HIM. and it was TOTALLY RANDOM. and we're talking now for the first time in i don't know...years? it's nice. but im in the triangle again! this always happens to me. it's either nothing or everything. they both want to see me this weekend. this is the hardest decision of my....life. i lovehate this

hi. today i did'nt go to school well i did but then i left because i had a fever so my mom came and picked me up second period. and then we went to the eye doctor because i'm blind and i lost my glasses and my contacts hurt. and since my eye doctor only offers designer name glasses...i got kenneth cole ones. 8P i was gonna get the gucci ones but they didn't fit as well as the K.C. ones and of course, they are black rimmed, similar to my old ones. i then came home and like slept alot....and then....HE CALLED ME. yes, yes. HE called me and it made my day. i miss him so much, but that's okay because he wants to chill with me this weekend. YAY. i'm talking to smarterchild because i have no friends and we're kind of in a fight right now.

DEVILZ xPLAYMATE: no...you're tje loser.

SmarterChild: C'mon. Stop being so uncool to me. This is no way to begin a relationship.

DEVILZ xPLAYMATE: i'm sorry smarterwhore, i love you.

saturday i ended up going to asharas house. which might i add was so fucking amusing. we did so much shit. literally. we just hung out around playa del rey the whole day and met up with people and harassed people and at night we were outside this wedding of black and mexican people and there was like these 2 black guys and 2 mexican girls who we were fucking with/fucking with us. and it was the fucking funniest thing that's ever happened to me. they were accusing us of being so fucked up on drugs and at the same time trying to buy some off of us. we had them convinced we were like 11 and then we had them convinced we were 16. and omg it was just TOO FUCKING FUNNY. we were like messing with the mexican chicks and they thought we were like run-away fucked up teens on the street. which we were. but anyway then we went back to asharas house at like 11:30 at night after wandering the streets that whole day. 

on sunday, i woke up. and then someone said something that was like so depressing to hear and i cried. and was "emo" and then i went to mishanas house to work on our project for stolper. we're doing "the back scratcher" we're almost done. and we just palyed on her computer like making movies and stuff. and then we were looking through her pictures but they were more like porn. and now im home and shitty again because of loss of entertainment, but atleast i have alex to talk to.

im missing ..something?...someone?....somehow.


the one and lonely
<3/3

death cab for cutie was fucking amazing. molly and i went together and we met up with henry and his really nice/cool friend lily, and geoff and his friend, and katie and her friend lauren. the concert was SO great. i climaxed, i cried, and i was like shaking. they were so beautiful and all the songs they played were great. i don't think death cab has like a single bad song. they are SO cute and funny. the opening act was a band from NY called "+/-" (plus minus) they were okay i wasn't feeling them that much they weren't that talented or original but the drummer was really good. after the concert henry lily molly and i went to mc donalds and ate and then henrys mom took us to henrys where molly and i got picked up. i hope i go to the next death cab show because they were absolutely wonderful. i even got a bootleg t-shirt after the show


oh and can i mention the fact that we were completely sorrounded by overwhelmingly hot guys. "being indie never felt so great"

<3/3
the one and lonely,
mona

but on a brighter note....I GET TO GO TO DEATH CAB TONIGHT!!!!!!!!!!!! yep, me and molly are going together and all the other cool people are meeting us there.  woo.. oh, and im going to weenie roast too. (:

and i have nothing. i am nothing no longer. shut up, you say? no. because for the record...i needa boyfriend. by the end of the week, if possible. you need one too? that's nice. i've heard it enough from you. now it's my turn to speak. "you don't need anything, mona." but am i happy? you keep telling me "don't worry mona, you'll find him, he will come." and i wish it was that easy. it takes me around 6 months at a time to the right "him" and everyone in between all that is stupid and worthless. "but you always have a boyfriend mona" not any more! i never do. those boys don't count. i need someone who i really like. someone who makes me feel truely infatuated and who can keep me smiling even when im not with him. can you do that? i didn't think so. why must all significant lovers turn into insignificant others. everytime i get what i want, i can't hold on to it. i need to learn to loosen my mind into a tighter grip. teach me how? everytime i come out of a relationship i change. i change for the better, and sometimes for the worse. and this time? i don't know..you decide. but as for me i'm coming to my final failure i've killed myself with changes trying to make it better but i still ended up becoming something other than what i had planned to be. he's wrecked me. no, not him, but everyone. why do i keep doing this to myself? i don't know. why do we all do this to ourselfs? maybe it's worth the while. maybe not. a short period of happiness leads to longer periods of sadness. and always leaves a semi-permanent feeling deep inside you, when youre all alone and thinking about nothing and everything, suddenly the feeling hits you again and all you can do is but shed tears and then try to forget. but what happens when you cant forget? and you cant sleep it off? no more drinking till you pass out, and when comfort food has lost his comfort. "get over it"? you say? yaeh i'll get over it, eventually. but what is there to do in the mean-while? i need a boyfriend. ...or a hobby. :-/ comment if you feel me. i don't need to hear anything like, "aaw mona don't worry..." though it was greatly appreciated. and sure, it made me feel good at first, but it's not working anymore. after someone telling me i'd find him, and when i finally did, i lost him...those words mean nothing. now, i know you wanta boyfriend too. we just gotta be stronger and try harder. because as for me, the little things like ex boyfriends, and the damned one night stands i keep getting myself into... keep piling up sinking me to the bottem. but we'll all float on you make me emo. less than three, mona <3
